reviews.sentence: Special Celebration. My husband and I booked this hotel to celebrate our 25th wedding anniversary. We were greeted warmly on arrival and informed that we were receiving a room upgrade in honour of our anniversary. Once in the room we discovered a beautiful heart shaped cake compliments of the hotel. Our stay was wonderful. The room was spotlessly clean and just the right size for 2 adults. We had 2 very minor housekeeping issues both of which were rectified within minutes of phoning the front desk. The hotel was situated at the top of Orchard Road within a short walking distance of the subway and fantastic shopping malls. The breakfast was amazing plenty of choice. The omelette station was particularly good. The hotel staff were very friendly and effortlessly efficient always willing to engage in conversation and recommend local attractions. The Orchard Hotel made our anniversary very special and we could not have asked for a better experience. We recommend this hotel highly.

Fantastic location impeccable service. Great place to get around near to botanical gardens and many shopping malls The staff were amazing very attentive and helpful the rooms were spacious and very clean The included breakfast was good but be sure to be down promptly because it is quickly cleared away at 10 am It does however have an excellent choice.
Staff Location Facilities Room. Lift elevators can sometime get very busy and full. Leaving guests waiting a while. Breakfast very expensive if purchased separately.

Need renovation. Staff good performance good location warm welcome. Everything is good except the bath room. Too old and the bath room glass door not closed well and the water running out when having bath. It really brought me inconvenient.
Very good hotel. As always a very good hotel with excelent staff.

Excellent Hotel. I had a awesome time during my visit to Singapore this hotel situated on the one of the famous orchard road in Singapore surrounding with the famous markets and malls and in the heart of the city and close to all major attractions business centers I personally like this hotel very much from the time of checkin to checkout it was a excellent experience and Looking forward to stay in near future.

Excellent. While on business I was fortunate enough to stay at Orchard Hotel. The is the second time I have stayed over the years. The experience is always the same warm welcome by the concierge other friendly staff namely breakfast Amy and front desk guest relations Katey Tan. My thanks to you all for making my stay most pleasant. It was also appreciated the excellent assistance in having some forgotten items from my room returned which arrived back into my hands safely. The Hotel management should be very proud of their front line staff.

A short night in Singapore. We crashed here after 25 hours of airplane travel. The welcome at reception was warm. Our room was fairly basic. The room was clean and comfortable. The included breakfast buffet was very good. The morning departure also went well.

Wonderful Stay. service comfort people. Quite a breeze booking the room over Agoda. It was good value with the Agoda insider deals. Requested for a specific room and they met my request. The hotline was responsive with a general call centre that directs me to the correct department I need to find for my various questions. When I asked about checking in early they offered me to check in at 12 pm two hours ahead of actual check in time. When I asked for it to be even earlier They agreed to let me check in at 11 am though I eventually checked in closer to 12 pm. I also carelessly left my watch behind when I checked out and they managed to find my watch and called me back promptly to arrange for me to pick it up at my convenience. Really awesome service from the hotel staff.
Searching Visa. Pleasant stay for renewing the visa clean rooms good food friendly staff. Please go and try too enjoy your stay.

A five star sign on the outside of the hotel a three star service within. I ’ve stayed at the Orchard Hotel a couple of times previously. On a past occasion I expressed my dissatisfaction of the property via a previous trip advisor report. Although the situation slightly improved once I ’d complained the improvement was very short lived. In my opinion the standard of this hotel has seriously declined over the past 18 months. Start with check in. I arrived at the hotel at 170hrs and was greeted with a line of people waiting to check in The check in desk was under staffed Compounded by what seems like a very slow check in process the net effect was a 10 minute check in experience. The delay did give me the opportunity to repeatedly watch a rolling video of the awards this hotel group has enjoyed over the years. It made me laugh actually. It seems to me that they are wallowing in past glories. I did n’t see a single award of excellence in the last 6 years. My room was on the 12 floor it was small with a stained carpet dull decoration a dirty floor and poorly equipped throughout with low quality furniture. It did n’t stress me too much I was only there for one night. Breakfast was also terrible I confessed I arrived at 1020am breakfast is served until 1030 but form the moment I arrived I was rushed and hassled out. service was very poor mainly because they were too busy trying to clear everything away Food quality poor. the so called hot food eggs hash browns bacon etc had been standing so long if had either gone cold or become dried out. YukLoby drinks and food was good but outrageously priced i ve complained about that in the past. I have had enough of this place this was my last ever stay at the Orchard Hotel. Lots of good options in Singapore.

THIRD TIME AROUND. Last time we stayed at the hotel was 207 on the way back to the UK. Decided to have a two night stopover on the way back home after 5 weeks in NZ. Friendly and warm welcome at reception and was upgraded unfortunately it was room 730 which was adjacent to the lifts so quite disturbing during the night. Nice clean and large room with en suite although modernized since our last visit somewhat tired and needs cosmetic make over. Restaurant service good and continental breakfast good value for money and plenty of dishes to choose from. First night we sat in the bar. my wife and I had fish and chip snack with drinks quite expensive and draft beer tasted tainted. Complained to bar staff but they could not understand and kept asking if I wanted another beer. Hotel very busy and caters for a lot of business clients as well as in people on holiday. Very nice swimming pool on 4th floor and. pool attendant serves drinks and snacks to your sun lounger when you order. Overall staff gave good service.

Efficiently run hotel. 5 minute walk to central Orchard ION. Many restaurants and shops around to choose from. For the cost and location its good value. Staff are professional and rooms are small but clean.

Awesome. We arrived around 7 pm and checking in was a breeze. It is my second time to visit Singapore and my kids first time to travel. They enjoy the amenities of the hotel easy to navigate around V ery helpful staff and everyone was smiling and very cordial. Very clean and excellent service. Will definitely recommend Orchard hotel to my family and friends. Very affordable rates and we also got a free suite upgrade. That is very colStaf at the 17th floor buffet breakfast are very nice. Always serving with a smile. The breakfast is excellent so many food choices healthy combination. My kids love the dimsum buns and fruits especially the dragonfruit. Conveniently located near MRT station. Very close to shopping centers and fodcourts and the Claymore connect has nice fodshops as well. Nice walk every morning very safe. Only downside during our trip was that it was raining on some days and we were not able to tour as early as we would like to. Very clean surroundings too. People in Singapore are very disciplined. The 18th floor smells really good i love the fresh orchids that greet us daily. The snackrom is excellent for reading books or newspapers. The hotel lobby is very clean and nice. Relaxing music and some nights there are singers at the lounge to unwind. We enjoyed our 6 days stay in Singapore and hope to be able to visit again sometime in the future.

Orchardaisical Hotel. Have not been back for a few years was housed in a Chinoise themed club room. Absolutely lovely decor with tasteful modern Chinese elements mainlined in the room. The rooms is somewhat studio sized with a large bathroom and ample space between shower toilet cubical and tub. The room had only a small window with automated blinds. The only downside the club lounge is on another tower not much of an issue I skipped breakfast on most days lounge was small but packed a punch with a good selection of food. Soft skills were also wonderful and staffs there are generally friendly and helpful. Needed help with stationeries which was pleasantly fulfilled by the reception at the main lobby. The other lounge on the tower i stayed remained open however only coffee tea cookies and fruits were featured in the auto piloted lounge. Wonderful stay as yet again.

Nice Hotel close to shopping. Hotel is located on Orchard Rd. which is very convenient. Lots of shops and food options. I had breakfast included with my room and it was great. lots of options for hot and cold and even typical asian and Indian options as well. The hotel is nice and clean and staff is helpful and polite. I was on the 12th floor so it was nice and quiet. But the lobby was very busy and noisy. Close to lots and lots of shopping. Plus its close to the MRT to take you around the city. The room was equipped with a smart phone an awesome tool but no one mentioned it at checkin nor did they tell you how to use it that would be nice.
enjoyed the stay except for the comments above. food good service godbed too hard. shower bath not suitable for older people. drinks too dear had to go out to have a beer.

Trip October. Service Quality in general is good. I had to change the reservation days 2 times and respond was always quick and no extra costs where charged. Location is central in one of the main Shopping AreasMRT Station is Close by.

Chaotic during festival. Please Check in Early to avoid disappointment. Staffs are friendly and have good comunicationRoms are Spacious but not worth more than half a thousandlifts could be bigger and faster. Access Cards Problems.

A great room and great location right in the middle of the main street Orchard Road. The room was a great size it was designed well so that it looked and felt a lot bigger than it was. The bed was comfortable and bathroom clean and tidy. Our stay included buffet breakfast which was nice. I only like to eat Asian food but the Asian noodles in the bottom level were quite oily and not very healthy. The staff could have told us there was a MRT station right beneath the hotel and that most of the shops were in the MRT stations … we had no idea.
nice hotel worth the money. friendly staff room big enough for Singapore standards bath was a little bit outdated but still ok the most difficult topic was to get a taxi.

While I arrived on first sight busy of renovation activity on the some part of building. But after met the reception in front office they are polite and helpful so my tired disappeared. The room size and room interior is nice. The breakfast menu quiet same everyday nice but need to change the ather menu periodic so did not make boring especially for guest who stay more than 2 days. Last but not lease please do more improvement on the clean of pool. Bravo love it.

Great location great breakfast selection and comfortable rooms. The breakfast selection was amazing with a robot frying the eggs too. The service was mediocre. One staff advised me that my booking did not come with breakfast. And another confirmed it was. And the dining room was so full that the staff had to lie to the guests that it was so full that if they did not choose to sit outside without the aircon they will have to wait 30 minutes. As for the facilities the pool shower room needs to be clean and be better for use. There was no hot water no amenities no hair dryer. And there should be a water fountain by the pool not just bottled Perier. Also there should be staff on immediate standby who are more attentive in the lobby. A guest from China spit in the lobby by the potted plant and no one saw or attended to the matter. It was a horrible sight to see in such a nice hotel.

4 Night break. Had a fantastic 4 night stay at the Orchard hotel. Reception staff 1st class. Hotel is at one end of Orchard road which is a shoppers paradise. In Singapore it is so cheap easy to get around. Cost around £ 10 for a train pass MRT. Looks complicated when 1st get to the station but after the 1st journey I was showing others how it works. Really is a must when staying in Singapore busses not so easy. Back to the hotel. Breakfast plenty full having your omelette made by a robot amusing. We stayed in a premier club room which I ’d recommend. You get use of the club lounge which you can have breakfast afternoon tea evening drinks. Singapore is very very humid. How anyone can go back to the hotel not make use of the fabulous pool I do n’t know. Towels provided pool side it ’s a great place to cool down relax. Thank you so much for a fantastic stay. If we are ever back in Singapore we will return for sure. Peter Philpot family.
ok but reception stea. overall all finenot good at all is waiting time st reception not at all up to my expectations. could be reason not to come again.

Very very late check in. We transferred here from another on our 4th day in SG. We arrived in hotel around 2 pm in time for the check in. However when we got there they mentioned that rooms are not yet ready and still getting cleaned so they asked us to come back 40mins later. We came back by 3 pm and the rooms are still not ready. They mentioned they are fully booked and doing the best they can to have the rooms ready. They gave us 1 free drink on their lobby bar lounge to kill some time for the long wait. We were able to check in at 5 pm. We ’ve wasted 1 day just to wait in the lobby for check in. I wish they could have notified us through email then maybe we would not have rushed to check in and used the time to get around SG than sit in their lounge and wait for the room to get ready. They managed to provide all requests noted in the booking anyway so somehow they are taking efforts to provide an excellent service. The rooms are okay. Breakfast is limited. Not as much choices and the ground staffs are not very approachable.
Okay. The location was brilliant. Service by the pool was not consistent. Some staff were good some really rushed us at the breakfast. Checkin and checkouts are not quick service.

Best services and amenities. Stay over for one night and had a wonderful experience with the staff and hotel services. Special mention to the friendly counter staff Aeriz for going out of his way for our check in and queries. I will definitely go back again.
happy with the concierge services. I requested for early check in and late check out which was fulfilled during the registration.

Great hotel great location and staff that go out of their way to fix problems. We had two two day stopovers when traveling to Australia in this hotel in Sept 2019. We stayed here before but that was about 8 years ago and loved it and booked it again because of this experience. There were problems but in fairness to the staff they went out of their way to resolve it. My husband and I were traviling with our 11 month old son and booked premier club rooms in the orchard hotel to break up the trip to Australia. on the way to Australia we arrived early 9 am before check in and in fairness to the staff they advised that would have some rooms ready within a couple of hours which they did and we we are in a room by 11 am. The only problem which was a significant problem was the building works in the room next door where they were stripping the room back as part of the refurbishment programme. The banging and noise was horrendous. So we called recpetion and they immediately and without question moved and upgraded us to a signature club room which resolved the situation. The club rooms all come with access to the club lounge for breakfast afternoon tea and evening drinks and we can not praise the staff in the lounge enough for the way they looked after us particularly with our baby boy. They were attentive knowledgable and very helpful. The lounge is quiet with great views of the surrounding area as it is based on the 17th floor at the top of the building. The swiming pool area is a great area a really large pool and fairly quiet but great for us with our baby. The return journey we arrived late and booked a paid for late check out at half the room price to 6 pm. The room was a premier club room which is a great sized room and well equipted and on the 15th floor with great views. The staff again in the club lounge were brilliant. The only problem we encountered was on our last day with the late checkout. We had asked for our room to be tidied expecting bins to be emptied and bathroom cleaned but instead got locked out of our room by the hotel despite the preagred late check out. I would also note the holding deposit on my credit card which would have easlily covered this. So we had to get the room keys reactivated and then got some teas coffees and toilet rolls from house keeping which were on the floor. When finailising our bill we raised that we were disapointed with this part and they agreed to omit this charge from the bill. In fairness to the staff and management whilst there were problems they dealt with them really well and we are grateful for that and will look forward to staying at the Orchard Hotel again.

Orchard Hotel. I stayed here for 1 night during my short stay in Singapore. It has good points and bad sides. The hotel is located right on Orchard Road and takes about a 10minute walk to the subway station. The staff is friendly and the check in and check out process is very fast. The hotel lobby is large but there are only a few seats and it is really noisy because it is located in the lobby with 3 restaurants serving both guests inside and outside the hotel. The hotel room was large however unfortunately for me when I was sorted into the old room. I know the hotel is under repair they can do repairs from morning to afternoon when guests go out or shop but it is unacceptable when they repair at 20. The sound of drills and chisels continuously. I phoned the receptionist and about 10 minutes later the noise stopped. I appreciate handling the situation of the receptionist. If you are a shopping lover the hotel is a good choice with good location and better prices than other 5star hotels.

Very Poor. The check in was pathetic. The rooms and bed were smelling as if the sheets and pillow covers were not washed. The mattress were all worn out. Definitely should be scaled down from a 5 star property. Breakfast in the morning was very noisy and very crowded. The cook only one in number was stressed out and not able to serve omelet or cooked egg. The cleanliness of the breakfast area was “ REALLY BAD”Wil never stay there and would n’t recommend anyone to chose this hotel. The Taxi service is so messed up it took 25 minutes to call a Taxi to the porch. “NOTHING”Location is a bit of a positive but everything bad about the hotel negates this advantage.

it is ok. This hotel located at the start of Orchard Road and not far from eating places and bus station however must walk a bit to Orchard station MRTThe twin bed is not 120 cm wide so a bit difficult to use if you bring a child and want to sleep together. The room was quite big though. Too bad it is a full carpet one. The breakfast was ok has a varieties of food. there is a small eating place in the same building with the hotel aas well. For those will bring children has religious concern and might easily get offended you might want to avoid this place as across it there are night clubs and adult shops. On the weekend sometimes you can hear people shouting and quite a lot of women at least I think they are women with a lot of skin exposed. Just bring yourself nicely to other area. If you bring a bicycle and need service there is a Treknology shop about 250 metres across the road and 24 hours free bike station repair.

SEAPEX AND APSC MEETING. I write to thank the following very professional and responsible staff orchard has. They are very friendly in spite of their busy moment they still attend to me of all my events. These are staff should deserved great compliment CHOI chin chin Director haze yong catering ast Director Aston guest room director Ceclia banquet Nicholas banquet DANY aslan from IThere are many more staff I should thank them. Please keep all these staff they can not find any more in Singapore. Singapore hotels need such good staff. Kind regards Judy fong.

Located well but rest was crap pure. By early arrival we asked for early check in. Got this offered for 100 4hrs earlier. But we had to wait and come back all 30 to ask if ready. Meanwhile we drunk a coffee capucino. Though we were hotel guest listed for an expensive early check in we had to pay 22 for 2 beverages. After 25hrs of waiting we gave up. Room cleanliness was horrible. Our toothbrush glases had a cm thick layer of old toothpaste. Mentioned 3 times. no change hapend. Rest of cleanliness on same level. The breakfast venue reminds me to a cantina bright ice cold AC a bustle like x mas shopping on NY 5th avenue. And a deluxe room that offers a very small quensize bed is not also not state of the art anymore. 4 hangers in closet for 2 people also very poor dimensioned. Almost every drawer of furniture was occupied for amenties so we either had to squeeze our stuff into 2 small drawers or on a dirty shelf of let in 4days in the suitecase. My wife did the last. Good choice I took shelf and my white shirt was not white anymore. For shoes same issue. We parked them by lack of alternatives on the sofa so you avoid to stumble over it. Same situation in bath as well. Better leave all your staff in sewing bag because no other options availible. Our conclusion next time a different hotel and take a taxi to Orchard Road instead.

Poor service 25h check in wait. Very disappointing experience at check in. Came with young child. Staff made us wait 25h to get room ready. Only checked in at 1640 when check in time was 140. Manager was not proactive unable to deal with crowd on the day. Ordered in house meal and it was delivered without cutlery. Staff had to make another trip for the cutlery. Asked for feedback form but manager never got back on it. Very poor service standards for any hotel.
Is so different from before. I myself do enjoy the stay so much not only the hotel but also the service.
FOH staff at front desk not friendly. Rooms hotel features were bery nice. Great pool.
